function.desc: The type of waveform to use.

frequency.desc: The frequency of the waveform, in Hz.

amplitude.desc: The peak to peak voltage of the waveform, in volts.

offset.desc: The voltage offset of the waveform, in volts.

ramp_symmetry.desc: The ramp symmetry if the ramp waveform is used, in percent.

square_duty.desc: The duty of the square waveform if used, in percent.

pulse_width.desc: The pulse width in seconds if the pulse waveform is used.

level.desc: The trigger threshold voltage, in V.

edge_coupling.desc: The type of edge coupling to use for triggering.

edge_slope.desc: The type of edge slope to use for triggering.
